item.description:
Local Boston Attorney George Chiu will give the 11 December presentation - IN MANDARIN - on "Obamacare – the Affordable Care Act (ACA) in the USA" – What are the issues and types of issues that make this so controversial in America, when so many other civilized nations already have the “health security” of universal medical insurance – and Taiwan and China are reworking their own economies and the sustainable place of healthcare within those economies?  General discussion in Mandarin will follow George's talk.

"Obamacare – the Affordable Care Act (ACA) in the USA" -December 11, 2012 - IN MANDARIN - 7:00 pm.

We have general discussion from 6:00 pm-7:00 pm, a DISCUSSION TOPIC at 7:00 pm, and DISCUSSION (in Mandarin) from 7:30 -8:00 pm (then adjourn slightly after - but NOT before - 8:00 pm).

The schedule:
6:00 - 7:00 pm - General Discussion - BOTH Mandarin & English
7:00 - 7:30 pm - FOCUSED DISCUSSION TOPIC

Local Boston Attorney George Chiu will give the 11 December presentation - IN MANDARIN - on "Obamacare – the Affordable Care Act (ACA) in the USA" – What are the issues and types of issues that make this so controversial in America, when so many other civilized nations already have the “health security” of universal medical insurance – and Taiwan and China are reworking their own economies and the sustainable place of healthcare within those economies?  General discussion in Mandarin will follow George's talk.

7:30 - 8:00 pm- Mandarin discussion of Mandarin talk -General discussion in Mandarin will follow our speaker's talk.
The TUESDAY evening event is ALWAYS in the Longwood Medical Area, Boston, MA 02115 (near Mission Hill).

Check http://Chinese.Mandarin.com/35/for details.

You are WELCOME and ENCOURAGED to forward this to interested friends.
item.name: Talk IN MANDARIN: "Obamacare – the Affordable Care Act (ACA) in the USA"
